column1: ######CK2 Plus traits - credits to CK2 Plus Team

column2: As you men storm the church, they discover a rich cache of icons and relics, all of it gilded in gold and surely belonging to [From.Owner.GetTitledName]. Such greed and devotion to icons goes against everything the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith stands for...but this is still a holy place, is it not?
Destroy them, and take the gold
I will not desecrate such beauty
This character has a reputation for destroying the holy icons of the Christian faith.
